meanings.definition: The flat area on either side of the forehead.
meanings.sent1: She gently touched her temples to feel her pulse.
meanings.sent2: The sunlight warmed her temples as she walked outside.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly claimed his temples were the source of all his wisdom.
meanings.sent4: The temples of knowledge are said to reside in books.
meanings.sent5: The cool breeze brushed against her temples, providing relief from the heat.

meanings.sent2: People from all over the world visit the temples to pray.

meanings.sent5: The temple stood tall against the backdrop of the setting sun, a symbol of faith and devotion.
